names.pinyin: da huang huang qin xie xin tang
names.english: rhubarb and scute decoction to drain the epigastrium
names.commonEnglish: Rhubarb and Scute Decoction to Drain the Epigastrium

actions: Drains Heat, purges accumulations, drains Heat from the Blood, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and reduces Fire toxicity.
With Huang Qin and Huang Lian, for hematemesis or epistaxis due to Blood Heat.
Drains Fire, detoxifies, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
With Huang Lian, drains pathogenic Heat from the Upper and Middle Jiaos.
Drains Fire, resolves Fire toxicity, clears Heat and stops bleeding.

symptoms: Pain that is fixed, stabbing and /or severe
Blue, dark or purplish discoloration of skin in small or large areas
Tendency to hemorrhage dark blood or clots
sporadic Intestinal bleeding with fresh Blood
manifestations.tongue: Red purple with possible purple or red spots if there is Heat
